**Priority 1: Optimize Predictive Alerts Logic - Reduce false positives and improve efficiency in alerting mechanisms by fine-tuning the thresholds for tick gaps and self-heal activities based on historical data.** - This will enhance system responsiveness and reduce unnecessary notifications, leading to better operational focus and quicker response times.

**Priority 2: Implement Cost-Effective Resource Scaling - Develop an automated scaling feature that adjusts system resources (CPU, RAM) based on real-time usage patterns, particularly during peak and off-peak hours.** - This can significantly reduce unnecessary costs associated with over-provisioning resources, optimizing overall expenditure.

**Priority 3: Enhance User Dashboard Customization - Introduce customizable dashboard widgets for users to choose which metrics they want to monitor actively, including alerts and performance indicators.** - This will improve the user experience by allowing clients to tailor their interface to their specific needs, increasing engagement and satisfaction with the platform.
